SEARCH
Package InsultService

Class InsultService

java.lang.Object
InsultService.InsultService
All Implemented Interfaces:
InInsultService
public class InsultService extends Object implements InInsultService
The class InsultService implements the InInsultService interface and provides methods to add, get, and get all insults.
